name: The Lonely Bard
description:
Are you ready for a Romance Visual Novel  set in the world of  Dungeons and Dragons, made in Pixel art and full of customised songs?

You play as Hoppy Dingle, an adorable yet very lonely Gnome Bard who just wants to make music and friends. After a visit from a cheeky music fairy, she sets out on a journey to find friendship, love and her inspiration.

Along the way she meets the devoted and brave Paladin Barakiel, who keeps seeming to save her. Can she make him care about something beside his God?

And of course Quindak Eversong, the charming and shirtless innkeeper who seems VERY interested in Hoppy.

And perhaps, if you keep a close eye, you can meet the mysterious yet illusive Lephi, a Tiefling with a secret...

This game is a DEMO made for Nanoreno 2022, and I plan to continue it afterwards: Improving it with more story, content, mini games and of course MUSIC!

Please let me know your thoughts on this little gem that combines all the things I love: Dungeons and Dragons,  Romance, Visual Novels and MUSIC!
